import React from 'react'; export const User = ({ users, id, email, first_name, last_name, avatar, onClickInvite, isInvited, }) => (

  • {first_name} {last_name}

    {email}

    onClickInvite(id)} className="action" src={`/assets/${isInvited ? 'minus' : 'plus'}.svg`} alt="Action" />
